headline.main: U.N. Seeks Ways to Try North Koreans for Human Rights Abuses

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
keywords.name: subject

snippet: The Human Rights Council will appoint a panel to identify legal avenues for prosecuting North Korean leaders for crimes detailed in a 2014 report.
lead_paragraph: The Human Rights Council will appoint a panel to identify legal avenues for prosecuting North Korean leaders for crimes detailed in a 2014 report.
